item.description: Okay, so are any of you Irish? Wish you were Irish? Got an Irish girlfriend? Then come to our St. Patty's party! Lisa is sharing her home with us again. Dress up green to celebrate St. Patty! Bring that swap gift all wrapped...spend around $10.00 if you can. Bonnie-our organizer for the south shore-southeastern meet-up will run the swap. Lisa will cook up a great irish dinner. Everyone bring a small side. Bring your beverage of choice. I will bring the desert...I'm sure the L word will be on the big screen. We had alot of fun last time at Lisa's. Let's do it again!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: St. Patty's Yankee Swap and Potluck
